amendment.description: Amendment provides for withholding U.S. funding from any U.N. commission, organization or affiliated agency that is chaired or presided over by a country, the government of which the Secretary of State has determined has repeatedly provided support for acts of international terrorism, until such time that the President determines that they are no longer doing so.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part B of House Report 109-175 to withhold funding to the UN for any of its agencies or committees headed by nations on the State Department's terrorist watch list.
